resources.string:
The is Flower Haven, home of the best flower infused products of all time.
	Please feel free to go through our page and have a feel of some of our products.
	You may also review us on our social media outlets and contact on the various channels.
	Do have a wonderful time.
	Cheers!!

Hours Of Operation:

	 9am to 6pm on Mondays to Fridays

	 9am to 8pm on Saturdays

	1pm to 8pm on Sundays

You can review us and share your experience on our social media outlet below:

						Flower Haven 

						Flowhaven 

						FlowH 

						fHaven

You may reach out to us on the details below:

						 FlowerHaven@gmail.com 

						888 11101 99922

						1, off social road,Floral Avenue

						www.flowerhaven.org
